message: Let's be fair, 55-45 split seems reasonable.
Your split wasn't in our best interest long term.  I'm offering you 4000, take it or leave it,  knowing the value decreases rapidly for you in further rounds.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise. 52.5-47.5 split is the best I can offer.
The value will only continue to plummet, primarily for you. I'm offering a 55/45 split as a final offer.  This is your last chance for a reasonable amount.
